Action.author: jvsclp
Action.body: Noticed an issue that may be needed to be taken into account if naming the certificate file on generation with fabric-ca-client is implemented. As an admin, when the FABRIC_CA_CLIENT_HOME environment variable is set to the administrator's certificate location for registering an identity the only valid file name recognized within the administrator's msp/signcerts directory is cert.pem. If you rename the certificate manually fabric-ca-client will not recognize the renamed certificate despite having the correct credentials to perform a user registration.
